00009 #include "tea.h"
00016 void tea_encrypt(unsigned long *v,unsigned long *w,const unsigned long *k)
00017 {
00018         register unsigned long y=v[0],z=v[1],sum=0,delta=TEA_DELTA_KEY, a=k[0],b=k[1],c=k[2],d=k[3],n=TEA_CYCLES;
00019         while(n-->0)
00020         {
00021                 sum += delta;
00022                 y += ((z << 4)+a) ^ (z+sum) ^ ((z >> 5)+b);
00023                 z += ((y << 4)+c) ^ (y+sum) ^ ((y >> 5)+d);
00024         }
00025         w[0]=y; w[1]=z;
00026 }
00033 void tea_decrypt(unsigned long *v,unsigned long *w, const unsigned long *k)
00034 {
00035         register unsigned long  y=v[0],z=v[1],sum=TEA_SUM,delta=TEA_DELTA_KEY,a=k[0],b=k[1],c=k[2],d=k[3],n=TEA_CYCLES;
00036         /* sum = delta<<5, in general sum = delta * n */
00037         sum=TEA_DELTA_KEY;
00038         while(n-->0)
00039         {
00040                 z -= ((y << 4)+c) ^ (y+sum) ^ ((y >> 5)+d);
00041                 y -= ((z << 4)+a) ^ (z+sum) ^ ((z >> 5)+b);
00042                 sum -= delta;
00043         }
00044         w[0]=y; w[1]=z;
00045 }
00053 void alpha_tea(unsigned long *plain,unsigned long *cipher,unsigned long *key)
00054 {
00055         register unsigned long y=0;
00056         register unsigned long delta=TEA_DELTA_KEY;
00057         register unsigned long radix_left=0;
00058         register unsigned long radix_right=0;
00059         register unsigned long weaved_body=0;
00060         y=plain[0]+cipher[0];
00061         weaved_body=y^(plain[1]+delta);
00062         radix_left=plain[1]<<4;
00063         radix_right=plain[1]>>5;
00064         key[1]=((key[0]+radix_left)^weaved_body)-radix_right;
00065         
00066         
00067 }
00075 void beta_tea(unsigned long *plain,unsigned long *cipher,unsigned long *key)
00076 {
00077         register unsigned long y=0;
00078         register unsigned long z=0;
00079         register unsigned long delta=TEA_DELTA_KEY;
00080         register unsigned long radix_left=0;
00081         register unsigned long radix_right=0;
00082         register unsigned long weaved_body=0;
00083         y=plain[0];
00084         z=plain[1]+cipher[1];
00085         weaved_body=z^(cipher[0]+delta);
00086         radix_left=cipher[0]<<4;
00087         radix_right=cipher[0]>>5;
00088         key[3]=((key[2]+radix_left)^weaved_body)-radix_right;
00089 }
00097 void gamma_tea(unsigned long *plain, unsigned long *cipher, unsigned long *key)
00098 {
00099         
00100         register unsigned long y=0;
00101         register unsigned long delta=TEA_DELTA_KEY;
00102         register unsigned long middle_exp=0;
00103         register unsigned long radix_left=0;
00104         register unsigned long radix_right=0;
00105         register unsigned long weaved_body=0;
00106         y=cipher[0]-plain[0];
00107         middle_exp=plain[1]+delta;
00108         radix_left= plain[1] << 4;
00109         radix_right= plain[1] >> 5 ;
00110         weaved_body=y^middle_exp;
00111         /* generate a key by equation generated from TEA schedule 1 cycle weakness */
00112         key[0]=(weaved_body^(radix_right+key[1]))-radix_left;
00113 }
00121 void delta_tea(unsigned long *plain, unsigned long *cipher, unsigned long *key)
00122 {
00123         register unsigned long y=0;
00124         register unsigned long z=0;
00125         register unsigned long delta=TEA_DELTA_KEY;
00126         register unsigned long middle_exp=0;
00127         register unsigned long radix_left=0;
00128         register unsigned long radix_right=0;
00129         register unsigned long weaved_body=0;
00130         y=cipher[0];
00131         z=cipher[1]-plain[1];
00132         middle_exp=y+delta;
00133         radix_left= y << 4;
00134         radix_right= y >> 5 ;
00135         weaved_body=middle_exp^z;
00136         /* generate a key by equation generated from TEA schedule 1 cycle weakness */
00137         key[2]=(weaved_body^(radix_right+key[3]))-radix_left;
00138 }
